title: The Fall - Last Days of Gaia ENGLISH MOD only
description:
This is the English mod of \\\\\\\"The Fall - Last Days of Gaia\\\\\\\"

Since the projeckt is dropped to do the game in english, som translated it.

Its here on the bay, BUT only in a huge pack, so here is, only the english mod.

BUT its talk is german , but who cares.


Installation notes: 

1. Install your game by putting the orginal game in the cd/dvd drive and install the game (duh)
2. Apply the patch 1.9 and thereafter patch 1.10
3. Apply the english mod by copying the two folders in to the game directory
4. Play :)

CONTINUUM translated everything BY HAND. Whoever that is, but thankz to them.
